actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the imposition of excessive customs fees for foreign trade zone services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Foreign Trade Zone Fee Structure Act of 1987

summary.text: Foreign Trade Zone Fee Structure Act of 1987 - Prohibits the Commissioner of Customs from implementing: (1) a fee relating to the commercial operation of foreign trade zones by the U.S. Customs Service; and (2) a fee structure in connection with Customs Service supervision of foreign trade zones that would offset the competitive cost advantage enjoyed by foreign trade zone operators, offset the operational advantages that accrue with respect to merchandise imported through foreign trade zones, or demonstrably inhibit the use of foreign trade zones.

titles.title: Foreign Trade Zone Fee Structure Act of 1987
A bill to prohibit the imposition of excessive customs fees for foreign trade zone services, and for other purposes.
